meanings.definition: A nocturnal marsupial native to North and South America, known for its prehensile tail and tendency to play dead when threatened.
meanings.sent1: The opossum climbed the tree with its tail wrapped around a branch.
meanings.sent2: I saw an opossum in the backyard last night.
meanings.sent3: The opossum pretended to be asleep when the dog barked at it.
meanings.sent4: She played dead like an opossum to avoid the awkward conversation.
meanings.sent5: The opossum's tail was as useful as an extra hand.

meanings.sent1: The soft opossum fur was used to make a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stylish coat made of opossum fur.
meanings.sent3: The opossum fur hat kept her head warm in the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her coat was as fluffy as opossum fur.
meanings.sent5: The opossum fur felt like a cloud against her skin.
